name: Brad the Endless Bread-Man
description:
Brad the Endless Bread-Man is an endless runner based of a game i made in high school. Brad is a simple duck who just wants to eat as much bread as possible. in this endless runner you need to dodge spikes and evil robots to eat as much bread as you can.

Controls:

Space - Jump

Escape - Pause

Fonts by Eeve Somepx

Music:

Fluffing a Duck and Pixelland by Kevin MacLeod | https://incompetech.com/

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
